nodes.text: This unidentified Nikto was a criminal who was active during the Clone Wars. In 21 BBY, he helped the bounty hunter Cad Bane capture the protocol droid C-3PO and the astromech droid R2-D2. During the mission, this Nikto served as the pilot of Cad Bane's RGC-16 airspeeder. He ferried Cad Bane, the bounty hunter's techno-service droid Todo 360, and the Assassin droid HELIOS-3E to their Coruscant hideout. He later took back the captured droids by speeder.
